5 FnFadv::FnFadv()
6 {
7  datagot_ = false;
8  following_ = false;
9  insight_ = false;
10  running = true;
11  moving_ = false;
12  beside_ = false;
13  behind_ = false;
14  searching_ = true;
15  interrupt_ = false;
16  diameter = 0.46;
17  start();

19  // //std::thread(&FnF::setLRaCs,this);

23 void FnFadv::start()
24 {
25 
26  threads_.push_back(std::thread(&FnFadv::search,this));
27  threads_.push_back(std::thread(&FnFadv::following,this));
28  threads_.push_back(std::thread(&FnFadv::getRobot1poses,this));
29  threads_.push_back(std::thread(&FnFadv::distancecheck,this));
30 }
31 
32 FnFadv::~FnFadv()
33 {
34  running = false;
35  //Join threads
36  for(auto &t: threads_)
37  {
38  t.join();
39  }
40 }

84 
85 void FnFadv::following()
86 {
87  ros::Duration(2.0).sleep();
88  FnFData data;
89  geometry_msgs::PoseArray poses;
90  geometry_msgs::Pose current;
91  geometry_msgs::Pose current1;
92  geometry_msgs::Point goal;
93  nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid grid;
94  ros::Rate rate_limiter(1.0/2.0);
95  //ros::Duration(2.0).sleep();
96  while(ros::ok())
97  {
98  geometry_msgs::Pose temp;
99  geometry_msgs::Point goal_local;
100  geometry_msgs::Point zero;
101 
102 
103  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lck(Followmtx_);
104  Followcv_.wait(lck,[&](){return following_ == true;});
105  lck.unlock();
106 
107  mtx_.lock();
108  data = data_;
109  current = data_.pose0;
110  current1 = data_.pose1;
111  grid = Grid_;
112  mtx_.unlock();
113  if(!interrupt_)
114  {
115  temp.position = current1.position;
116  goal = getpointbehindR1(current1);
117  geometry_msgs::Point p;
118  p.x = -0.3;
119  p.y = 0;
120  p = localtoglobal(current1,p); //find point just behind r1 to avoid false negatives. I.e. the case where its reported that the space is occupied due to the presence of r1 itself
121 
122  zero.x = p.x - current.position.x; //position of r1 in ogmap
123  zero.y = p.y - current.position.y;
124  goal_local.x = goal.x - current.position.x; //position behind r1 in ogmap
125  goal_local.y = goal.y - current.position.y;
126 
127  GridProcessing gridproc(grid);
128  bool reachable = gridproc.checkConnectivity(zero,goal_local); //check if the space between r1 and the point behind it is unobstructed
129  double dist_t_r1 = pow(pow((current1.position.y-current.position.y),2) + pow((current1.position.x - current.position.x),2),0.5);
130  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Dist: "<<dist_t_r1);
131  if(dist_t_r1>1.0) //if too close dont do anything
132  {
133 
134  if(!reachable)
135  {
136  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Point behind unreachable. Moving to closest available point");
137  goal = getpointaroundR1(current.position,current1.position);
138  }
139 
140  double yaw = atan2((temp.position.y-current.position.y),(temp.position.x-current.position.x));
141  if(yaw<0){yaw = yaw + 2*M_PI;}
142  YawtoQuat(yaw,temp);
143  temp.position = goal;
144 
145  Pathpacket packet = {current,current1,temp};
146  ROS_INFO_STREAM("FOLLOWING!");
147  geometry_msgs::PoseArray array = getpath(packet);
148  publishPose(array);
149  ROS_INFO_STREAM("GOAL REACHED!");
150  mtx_.lock();
151  data = data_;
152  current = data_.pose0;
153  current1 = data_.pose1;
154  mtx_.unlock();
155 
156  yaw = atan2((current1.position.y-current.position.y),(current1.position.x-current.position.x));
157  if(yaw<0){yaw = yaw + 2*M_PI;}
158  YawtoQuat(yaw,temp);
159 
160  temp.position = current.position;
161  geometry_msgs::PoseArray tempa;
162  tempa.poses = {temp};
163  publishPose(tempa);
164  }
165  if(dist_t_r1<1.0)
166  {
167  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Too close! Remaining still. Can I help you?");
168  rate_limiter.sleep();
169  }
170  }
171  }
172 }
173 
174 
175 void FnFadv::getRobot1poses()
176 {
177  ros::Duration(2.0).sleep();
178  FnFData data;
179  ros::Rate limiter(1/1.0); //1Hz
180  geometry_msgs::Pose temp;
181  geometry_msgs::PoseArray array;
182  int count = 0;
183 
184  while(ros::ok())
185  {
186  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lck(Followmtx_);
187  Followcv_.wait(lck,[&](){return following_ == true;});
188  lck.unlock();
189  mtx_.lock();
190  data = data_;
191  mtx_.unlock();
192  geometry_msgs::Pose pose = data.pose1;
193  if(temp.position.x == pose.position.x && temp.position.y == pose.position.y)
194  {
195  count++;
196  }
197  if(count >= 10 && !beside_)
198  {
199  array.poses.clear();
200  publishPose(array);
201  //following_ = false;
202  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Moving to side.");
203  standbeside();
204  }
205  if(temp != pose)
206  {
207  count = 0;
208  following_ = true;
209  beside_ = false;
210  interrupt_ = false;
211  }
212  temp = pose;
213  limiter.sleep();
214  }
215 
216 }
217 
218 void FnFadv::standbeside()
219 {
220  beside_ = true;
221  interrupt_ = true;
222 
223  geometry_msgs::PoseArray array;
224  geometry_msgs::Pose point_beside_l; //goal pose on left of r1
225  geometry_msgs::Pose point_beside_r; //goal pose on right of r1
226  geometry_msgs::Pose interim_l; //respective interim points to avoid colliding
227  geometry_msgs::Pose interim_r;
228  geometry_msgs::Point pb_local;
229  nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid grid;
230  geometry_msgs::Pose r1;
231  geometry_msgs::Pose r0;
232  int side = 0;
233 
234  mtx_.lock();
235  r0 = data_.pose0;
236  r1 = data_.pose1;
237  grid = Grid_;
238  mtx_.unlock();
239  GridProcessing gridprocc(grid);
240 
241  pb_local.x = 0;
242  pb_local.y = -1.0;
243  point_beside_r.position = localtoglobal(r1,pb_local);
244  point_beside_r.orientation = r1.orientation;
245  pb_local.y = 1.0;
246  point_beside_l.position = localtoglobal(r1,pb_local);
247  point_beside_l.orientation = r1.orientation;
248 
249  pb_local.x = -1.0;
250  pb_local.y = -1.0;
251  interim_r.position = localtoglobal(r1,pb_local);
252  double yaw = atan2((point_beside_r.position.y-interim_r.position.y),(point_beside_r.position.x-interim_r.position.x));
253  if(yaw<0){yaw = 2*M_PI + yaw;}
254  //if(yaw==0 && current.position.x>inter_point.position.x){yaw = M_PI;}
255  YawtoQuat(yaw,interim_r);
256 
257 
258  pb_local.y = 1.0;
259  interim_l.position = localtoglobal(r1,pb_local);
260  yaw = atan2((point_beside_l.position.y-interim_l.position.y),(point_beside_l.position.x-interim_l.position.x));
261  if(yaw<0){yaw = 2*M_PI + yaw;}
262  //if(yaw==0 && current.position.x>inter_point.position.x){yaw = M_PI;}
263  YawtoQuat(yaw,interim_l);
264 
265  geometry_msgs::Point corner1;
266  geometry_msgs::Point corner2;
267 
268  corner1.x = diameter/2;
269  corner1.y = diameter/2;
270  corner2.x = diameter/2;
271  corner2.y = -1*diameter/2;
272 
273  bool cornercheck1;
274  bool cornercheck2;
275 
276  checkCorners(r0,point_beside_r,corner1,corner2,gridprocc,cornercheck1,cornercheck2);
277  if(cornercheck1 && cornercheck2)
278  {
279  array.poses.push_back(point_beside_r);
280  std_msgs::ColorRGBA color;
281  color.a=1.0;//a is alpha - transparency 0.5 is 50%;
282  color.r=0;
283  color.g=1.0;
284  color.b=0;
285 
286  int marker_counter=0;
287  //Let's also publish the markerArray, we create a few markers
288  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray marker_array;
289  marker_array.markers.push_back(produceMarker(array.poses[0],color,marker_counter));
290  viz_pub_.publish(marker_array);
291  publishPose(array);
292  side = 23; //random number to avoid future if conditions
293  array.poses.clear();
294  }
295  if(side != 23)
296  {
297  checkCorners(r0,point_beside_l,corner1,corner2,gridprocc,cornercheck1,cornercheck2);
298  if(cornercheck1 && cornercheck2)
299  {
300  array.poses.push_back(point_beside_l);
301  std_msgs::ColorRGBA color;
302  color.a=1.0;//a is alpha - transparency 0.5 is 50%;
303  color.r=0;
304  color.g=1.0;
305  color.b=0;
306 
307  int marker_counter=0;
308  //Let's also publish the markerArray, we create a few markers
309  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray marker_array;
310  marker_array.markers.push_back(produceMarker(array.poses[0],color,marker_counter));
311  viz_pub_.publish(marker_array);
312  publishPose(array);
313  side = 23; //random number to avoid future if conditions
314  array.poses.clear();
315  }
316  }
317  if(side != 23)
318  {
319  checkCorners(r0,interim_r,corner1,corner2,gridprocc,cornercheck1,cornercheck2);
320  if(cornercheck1 && cornercheck2)
321  {
322  geometry_msgs::Pose ext_temp; //extrapolated pose to if r0 is at the interim point coz we now want to check if the path between the interim point and the point beside r1 is free
323  ext_temp.position = interim_r.position;
324  checkCorners(ext_temp,point_beside_r,corner1,corner2,gridprocc,cornercheck1,cornercheck2);
325  if(cornercheck1 && cornercheck2)
326  {
327  side = 1;
328  }
329  }
330  }
331  if(side == 0)
332  {
333  checkCorners(r0,interim_l,corner1,corner2,gridprocc,cornercheck1,cornercheck2);
334  if(cornercheck1 && cornercheck2)
335  {
336  geometry_msgs::Pose ext_temp; //extrapolated pose to if r0 is at the interim point coz we now want to check if the path between the interim point and the point beside r1 is free
337  ext_temp.position = interim_r.position;
338  checkCorners(ext_temp,point_beside_l,corner1,corner2,gridprocc,cornercheck1,cornercheck2);
339  if(cornercheck1 && cornercheck2)
340  {
341  side = 2;
342  }
343  }
344  }
345  if(side == 0)
346  {
347  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Cannot reach either side. Staying put.");
348  }
349 
350  if(side == 1)
351  {
352  array.poses.push_back(interim_r);
353  std_msgs::ColorRGBA color;
354  color.a=1.0;//a is alpha - transparency 0.5 is 50%;
355  color.r=0;
356  color.g=0;
357  color.b=1.0; //it will be blue - for interim pose
358 
359  int marker_counter=0;
360  //Let's also publish the markerArray, we create a few markers
361  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray marker_array;
362  marker_array.markers.push_back(produceMarker(array.poses[0],color,marker_counter));
363  viz_pub_.publish(marker_array);
364  publishPose(array);
365 
366  array.poses[0] = point_beside_r;
367  color.a=1.0;
368  color.r=0;
369  color.g=1.0;
370  color.b=0.0;
371 
372  marker_counter=0;
373  //Let's also publish the markerArray, we create a few markers
374  marker_array.markers.clear();
375  marker_array.markers.push_back(produceMarker(array.poses[0],color,marker_counter));
376  viz_pub_.publish(marker_array);
377  publishPose(array);
378  }
379  if(side == 2)
380  {
381  array.poses.push_back(interim_l);
382  std_msgs::ColorRGBA color;
383  color.a=1.0;//a is alpha - transparency 0.5 is 50%;
384  color.r=0;
385  color.g=0;
386  color.b=1.0; //it will be blue - for interim pose
387 
388  int marker_counter=0;
389  //Let's also publish the markerArray, we create a few markers
390  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray marker_array;
391  marker_array.markers.push_back(produceMarker(array.poses[0],color,marker_counter));
392  viz_pub_.publish(marker_array);
393  publishPose(array);
394 
395  array.poses[0] = point_beside_l;
396  color.a=1.0;
397  color.r=0;
398  color.g=1.0;
399  color.b=0.0;
400 
401  marker_counter=0;
402  //Let's also publish the markerArray, we create a few markers
403  marker_array.markers.clear();
404  marker_array.markers.push_back(produceMarker(array.poses[0],color,marker_counter));
405  viz_pub_.publish(marker_array);
406  publishPose(array);
407  }
408 }

634 // geometry_msgs::PoseArray FnFadv::goaround(Pathpacket pack,geometry_msgs::Point corner1,geometry_msgs::Point corner2)
635 // {
636 // geometry_msgs::PoseArray array;

849 
850 void FnFadv::distancecheck()
851 {
852  ros::Duration(2.0).sleep();
853  FnFData data;
854  geometry_msgs::Pose current;
855  geometry_msgs::Pose current1;
856  geometry_msgs::PoseArray array;
857  while(ros::ok())
858  {
859  mtx_.lock();
860  data = data_;
861  mtx_.unlock();
862  current = data.pose0;
863  current1 = data.pose1;
864 
865  double dist_t_r1 = pow(pow((current1.position.y-current.position.y),2) + pow((current1.position.x - current.position.x),2),0.5);
866  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Dist: "<<dist_t_r1);
867  if(dist_t_r1<0.6) //if too close dont do anything
868  {
869  array.poses.clear();
870  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Too close! Abandoning current goal");
871  publishPose(array);
872  }
873  }
874 }
